critique: The executive order appears to be a legal document regarding land use. It revokes a previous order and restores land to the public domain. There is no indication of an attempt to evoke any particular emotion in the reader. Therefore, all emotion scores should be low. Initial scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1. Revised scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1.
